task.summary: fixup! feat: Add CSV upload, storage configuration

feat: Add testcontainers for integration testing and improve UploadService serialization
- Updated `pom.xml` with testcontainers dependencies for PostgreSQL integration testing. - Modified `UploadEntity` to use `@JdbcTypeCode` for JSON column mapping. - Refactored `UploadService` to directly handle `List<String>` for headers. - Introduced a `@Profile` annotation for `SecurityConfig` to exclude it in test environments. - Added an integration test (`UploadControllerIT`) using testcontainers and a test security configuration. - Added `application-test.yml` for test-specific configuration.

test: enhance test coverage for UploadController and UploadService
- Added new test cases for handling missing files, non-CSV file uploads, unauthorized access, and various error scenarios. - Refactored existing test cases to handle exceptions explicitly with `throws` declarations.

test: add edge case tests for UploadController and update configurations
- Added test cases for empty file, malformed headers, malformed CSV, and oversized CSV uploads. - Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` with new run configurations for debugging and test environments.
fix: ensure normalized paths in UploadService to prevent path traversal vulnerabilities
chore: update .gitignore to exclude IntelliJ creating .ai folder constantly
WIP: templates
WIP: uploads 1
WIP: invoice entities, repositories, and migrations
WIP: invoice entities, repositories, and migrations
Default task

feat: enhance upload process with mapping and template support
- Introduced `mappingId` and `templateId` to upload flow for additional context. - Added new DTOs (`CreateUploadRequest`, `CreateUploadJobRequest`) to streamline data handling. - Refactored `UploadService` and `UploadJobService` to process uploads with mapping and template IDs. - Updated `UploadJobMessage` to include `mappingId` and `templateId`. - Adjusted package structure and configuration to align with updated shared module.

feat: add mapping creation and persistence
- Implemented `MappingService` to handle mapping creation using `CreateMappingCommand`. - Added DTOs (`CreateMappingCommand`, `MappingConfig`, `MappingField`, `MappingSource`, etc.) for mapping structure. - Created `MappingEntity` and `MappingRepository` for persistence with schema and config handling. - Introduced database migration to create `mappings` table

feat: add mapping validation to upload process
- Introduced `getMappingById` method in `MappingService` to validate and fetch user-specific mappings during uploads. - Added `MappingNotFoundException` to handle missing mappings. - Created `MappingExceptionHandler` to provide error responses for mapping-related errors. - Updated `UploadController` to validate `mappingId` in the upload request. - Introduced `ApiError` for standardized error responses.

refactor: move shared package components to feature-specific packages
- Restructured `shared` package components into appropriate feature-specific packages for better organization. - Updated imports and references across `api` and `worker` modules to reflect the new package structure.

refactor: restructure project packages for consistency
- Renamed `api` module artifactId and updated description in `pom.xml`. - Restructured package structure in the `api` module to organize components under `api` and feature-specific subpackages. - Updated imports and references to align with the new structure.

refactor: restructure project packages for consistency
- Renamed `api` module artifactId and updated description in `pom.xml`. - Restructured package structure in the `api` module to organize components under `api` and feature-specific subpackages. - Updated imports and references to align with the new structure.

refactor: restructure project packages for consistency
- Renamed `api` module artifactId and updated description in `pom.xml`. - Restructured package structure in the `api` module to organize components under `api` and feature-specific subpackages. - Updated imports and references to align with the new structure.

refactor: restructure project packages for consistency
- Renamed `api` module artifactId and updated description in `pom.xml`. - Restructured package structure in the `api` module to organize components under `api` and feature-specific subpackages. - Updated imports and references to align with the new structure.

refactor: remove `@Setter` and ability to set schema
Schema is auto-generated and should not be set manually.
- Removed unused `@Setter` annotation from `schema` field.

feat: add seeders for users and mapping configuration
- Seeders will only run in non-production environments.
fix: update package reference for `json_format_mapper` in worker `application.yml`
fixup! feat: add seeders for users and mapping configuration
fix: correct package name in trusted packages configuration

feat: add CSV header parsing and validation to upload process
- Implemented `parseCsvHeaders` method in `UploadService` to extract and validate headers from uploaded CSV files. - Updated `UploadEntity` to store CSV headers as a JSONB field in the database. - Modified database schema to include `headers` column in `uploads` table.

refactor: move mapping validation from `UploadController` to `UploadService`
- Removed mapping validation logic from `UploadController` for better separation of concerns. - Added `MappingService` as a dependency in `UploadService` to handle mapping validation during uploads.

refactor: move mapping validation from `UploadController` to `UploadService`
- Removed mapping validation logic from `UploadController` for better separation of concerns. - Added `MappingService` as a dependency in `UploadService` to handle mapping validation during uploads.

feat: introduce shared module, worker module, and RabbitMQ integration

feat: enhance upload process with mapping and template support
- Introduced `mappingId` and `templateId` to upload flow for additional context. - Added new DTOs (`CreateUploadRequest`, `CreateUploadJobRequest`) to streamline data handling. - Refactored `UploadService` and `UploadJobService` to process uploads with mapping and template IDs. - Updated `UploadJobMessage` to include `mappingId` and `templateId`. - Adjusted package structure and configuration to align with updated shared module.

feat: add mapping creation and persistence
- Implemented `MappingService` to handle mapping creation using `CreateMappingCommand`. - Added DTOs (`CreateMappingCommand`, `MappingConfig`, `MappingField`, `MappingSource`, etc.) for mapping structure. - Created `MappingEntity` and `MappingRepository` for persistence with schema and config handling. - Introduced database migration to create `mappings` table

feat: add mapping validation to upload process
- Introduced `getMappingById` method in `MappingService` to validate and fetch user-specific mappings during uploads. - Added `MappingNotFoundException` to handle missing mappings. - Created `MappingExceptionHandler` to provide error responses for mapping-related errors. - Updated `UploadController` to validate `mappingId` in the upload request. - Introduced `ApiError` for standardized error responses.

refactor: move shared package components to feature-specific packages
- Restructured `shared` package components into appropriate feature-specific packages for better organization. - Updated imports and references across `api` and `worker` modules to reflect the new package structure.

refactor: restructure project packages for consistency
- Renamed `api` module artifactId and updated description in `pom.xml`. - Restructured package structure in the `api` module to organize components under `api` and feature-specific subpackages. - Updated imports and references to align with the new structure.

Schema is auto-generated and should not be set manually.
- Removed unused `@Setter` annotation from `schema` field.

- Seeders will only run in non-production environments.

refactor: move mapping validation from `UploadController` to `UploadService`
- Removed mapping validation logic from `UploadController` for better separation of concerns. - Added `MappingService` as a dependency in `UploadService` to handle mapping validation during uploads.
